mapper.select: select TO_CHAR((select sum(PUR_NUM) from TYPE where ITEM_CODE= #{item_code}), '99,999')as TOTAL_PUR, CAT_NAME, TITLE, MAIN_IMAGE, IMAGE_ITEM, TO_CHAR(CUR_SUM, '999,999,999,999') as NOW_SUM, TRUNC((CUR_SUM/TARGET_SUM)*100, 0) as PERCENT, TO_CHAR(TARGET_SUM, '999,999,999') as TARGET, TO_CHAR(CLOSINGDATE, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"' ) AS DEADLINE, CONTENT, IMAGE, EMAIL, NICKNAME, TRUNC(CLOSINGDATE-SYSDATE,0) as TIME, T.TYPE_CODE, T.NAME, T.INFO, TO_CHAR(T.PRICE, '999,999,999') as OP_PRICE, TO_CHAR(T.PUR_NUM, '99,999')as PURNUM from ITEM I natural join MEMBER natural join CATEGORY natural join SELLER left outer join TYPE T on I.ITEM_CODE=T.ITEM_CODE where I.ITEM_CODE =#{item_code}
mapper.update: update ITEM set SUCCESS=2 where TRUNC(CLOSINGDATE-SYSDATE,0)=-1 and ADMIN_CALL=1 and SUCCESS=0
update ITEM set SUCCESS=1 where ITEM_CODE=#{ITEM_CODE} and ADMIN_CALL=1 and SUCCESS=0
